import React, { useState } from 'react' import './loginsignup.css' import person_icon from '../Assets/person.png' import email_icon from '../Assets/email.png' import passwor_icon from '../Assets/password.png' function LoginSignUp() { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(false); const toggleLogin = () => { setIsLogin(!isLogin) } const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ email : "", password : "" }) return (
{isLogin?"Login":"Signup"}
{isLogin? null :
} {isLogin? null :
}
{isLogin?"Don't have an account? ":"Already have an account? "} {isLogin?"Register":"Login"}
{isLogin?"Login":"Sign up"}
) } export default LoginSignUp
